about_the_game:
Explore a fun and dangerous open world in this darkly comedic soulslike RPG! Talk your way out of (or into) problems, battle monsters, befriend or betray the villagers, learn magic, collect tools and weapons, oh yeah - and find out how you got turned into a cat!

Floppy Cat Adventures is an open world RPG where your choices have real consequences. The more people, er - cats, die: the harder it will be to uncover the truth before... uh, anyways, there's lots of unique and exciting characters to meet! Build trust with your favorites and maybe they'll tell you something you wish they hadn't! Other villages? Who told you about those? I mean - there's no other villages. You'd have to fight your way through hordes of monsters to get there anyways...

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: multicore processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Vulkan capable graphics
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires Vulkan
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: multicore processor
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVidia 1060 or better or AMD equivalent
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: Requires Vulkan
